sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from "@angular/core"; import { NgbCalendar, NgbDateStruct } from "@ng-bootstrap/ng-bootstrap"; import * as data from "../../../shared/data/dashboard/default"; @Component({ selector: "app-default", templateUrl: "./default.component.html", styleUrls: ["./default.component.scss"], }) export class DefaultComponent implements OnInit { constructor(calendar: NgbCalendar) {} ngOnInit() {} public purchase = data.purchase public salesReturn = data.salesReturn public sales = data.sales public purchaseRate = data.purchaseRate }
